STOWAWAY_QUANTUM_SMUGGLING.Name: Quantum Smuggling
STOWAWAY_QUANTUM_SMUGGLING.Description: Drop an item on a quantum object and pick it up at a different state

STOWAWAY_SOLAR_PANEL_BONKED.Name: Bonk
STOWAWAY_SOLAR_PANEL_BONKED.Description: Bump into a solar panel with your ship disabling any storm shelters nearby

STOWAWAY_TORNADO_CAMPFIRE_WAKE_UP.Description: Wake up from a tornado while sleeping at a campfire

STOWAWAY_GOLEM_CONNECTION.Name: Golem
STOWAWAY_GOLEM_CONNECTION.Description: Use an advanced projection stone to create a voyager
